description: A master pro-inflammatory cytokine that modulates multiple signalling pathways.
An autoimmune disease characterized by chronic inflammation of the joints.
A type of arthritis that primarily affects the spine, leading to severe inflammation.
A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that affects the lining of the digestive tract.
One of the receptors for Tumour Necrosis Factor that mediates its effects.
Another receptor for Tumour Necrosis Factor involved in signaling pathways.
